help-file.title: "SENSE SPIRIT"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Spiritual
This spell will enable you to sense hidden life forms in a room. Creatures affected by "Invisibility" and/or "Hide" will appear as definite lifeforms, although you will be unable to discern their true nature.
